title: Watch Phase - Watch Face
summary: A customizable minimal Android Wear watch face where the time rotates into view.
description: Watch Phase is a customizable minimal Android Wear watch face where the time rotates elegantly into view.Display the passing of time on your wrist in a unique way.Features:‚Ä¢ Compatible with Wear 1 and 2.‚Ä¢ Fully standalone, features can be configured directly on the watch.‚Ä¢ Six customizable color themes.‚Ä¢ Customizable ambient mode.‚Ä¢ Optional hour, minute, and second hand for a more conventional feel.‚Ä¢ Optional markers in ten minute increments to help tell the time at a glance.‚Ä¢ Switch the complication display between minutes and the day of the month.
descriptionHTML:
Watch Phase is a customizable minimal Android Wear watch face where the time rotates elegantly into view.

Display the passing of time on your wrist in a unique way.

Features:
• Compatible with Wear 1 and 2.
• Fully standalone, features can be configured directly on the watch.
• Six customizable color themes.
• Customizable ambient mode.
• Optional hour, minute, and second hand for a more conventional feel.
• Optional markers in ten minute increments to help tell the time at a glance.
• Switch the complication display between minutes and the day of the month.
comments: I can't install this app. Unable to get the widget.
Edit: I stand corrected. Beautiful and unique, if not overly intuitive in the beginning üòÅ Recommended!

This watch face contains so much awesome it got me pregnant the first time i put it on my wrist, no word of a lie.  Ps. Please add more themes, especially darker ones for those of us with oleds, also a left handed version so the faces roates in a circle the other way.
Very unique watch face. Needs some more customization options and complications. Other than that, perfect!
Superb minimalist face. My go to watch choice now
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Changes to the 12/24hr system setting are now reflected instantly without needing to reload the watch face.
‚Ä¢ Changed the text on the Ambient Mode configuration to better reflect the visual changes.
‚Ä¢ Complication is now available in Ambient Mode as an optional setting.
